error.privilege_missing: OPNsense User has insufficient privileges. Must have admin access.
error.missing_device_unique_id: Unable to get MAC addresses from OPNsense to use as Device Unique ID
error.below_min_firmware: OPNsense Firmware of {firmware} is below the minimum supported version of {min_firmware}
error.unknown_firmware: Unable to get OPNsense Firmware version

user.title: Connect to the OPNsense firewall / router

reconfigure.title: Update connection to the OPNsense firewall / router

device_tracker.description: Choose which devices you want to track. If you don't select any devices, all devices will be tracked but will be disabled by default. If you do select any devices, only those devices will be tracked and will be enabled by default.

data_description.manual_devices: Separate multiple MAC Addresses with a comma. Invalid MAC Addresses will be ignored. ex. 00:00:00:00:00:00, 11:11:11:11:11:11

below_min_firmware.title: OPNsense Firmware below Minimum Version
below_min_firmware.description: hass-opnsense {version} requires OPNsense firmware {min_firmware} or later. Please upgrade OPNsense firmware to {min_firmware} or later. hass-opnsense will not start otherwise.

below_ltd_firmware.title: OPNsense Firmware below Recommended Version
below_ltd_firmware.description: Some hass-opnsense {version} functions require OPNsense firmware {ltd_firmware} or later. With firmware {firmware}, some functions may not work and there may be errors in the logs.

device_id_mismatched.title: OPNsense Hardware Has Changed
device_id_mismatched.description: OPNsense Device ID has changed which indicates new or changed hardware. In order to accommodate this, hass-opnsense needs to be removed and reinstalled for this router. hass-opnsense is shutting down.
